title: Minor things in v2.8.2
content:
ENHANCEMENTS:
- Timelapse export auto adds 5 seconds of the last frame to the end
- Theme icon now has dynamic anti-alias setting based on icon size
- Move tool can work with group/folder
- Group/folder's children can be quickly merged into 1 layer

FIXES:
- Timelapse export artifact with size multiplier
- Canvas resize UI being overlapped by the status bar
- Crash with really really big size multiplier when exporting
- Group/folder with only tilemap layers cannot be expanded
- Crash when existing palette has more than 254 colors
